property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.connection.provider
property.description: A contract for obtaining JDBC connections

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.connection.properties
property.description: Connection properties for jdbc connection.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.query.rewriter
property.description: Rewriting the HQL to optimized sql queries

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.regex.replacement.values
property.value: to_date=date, format_number=format, date_sub\((.*?)\,\s*([0-9]+\s*)\)=date_sub($1\, interval $2 day), date_add\((.*?)\,\s*([0-9]+\s*)\)=date_add($1\, interval $2 day)
property.description: Rewriting the HQL to optimized sql queries

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.driver.class
property.description: Type of JDBC driver used to connect backend database

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.db.uri
property.description: JDBC connection URL in the format jdbc:dbms://host:port/dbname

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.db.user
property.description: The database user on whose behalf the connection is being made

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.db.password
property.description: The database user's password

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.pool.max.size
property.description: Maximum number of concurrent connections allowed in pool

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.pool.idle.time
property.description: Maximum idle time in sec before a connection is closed

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.pool.max.statements
property.description: Maximum number of prepared statements to cache per connection

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.get.connection.timeout
property.description: The number of milliseconds a client calling getConnection() will wait for a Connection to be checked-in or acquired when the pool is exhausted. Zero means wait indefinitely. Setting any positive value will cause the getConnection () call to time-out and break with an SQLException after the specified number of milliseconds. The default value of this property is 10 secs.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.connection.properties
property.description: Connection properties for jdbc estimate connection.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.driver.class
property.description: Type of JDBC driver used to connect backend database for estimate queries. If This property is not specified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.driver.class will be used. Override this property to tune estimate connection pool

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.db.uri
property.description: JDBC connection URL in the format jdbc:dbms://host:port/dbname for estimate queries. If this property is unspecified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.db.uri will be used.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.db.user
property.description: The database user on whose behalf the connection is being made, for estimate queries. If this property is unspecified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.db.user would be used. Override this property to tune estimate connection pool

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.db.password
property.description: The database user's password, for estimate queries. If this property is unspecified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.db.password would be used. Override this property to tune estimate connection pool

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.pool.max.size
property.description: Maximum number of concurrent connections allowed in pool, for estimate queries. If this property is unspecified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.pool.max.size would be used. Override this property to tune estimate connection pool

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.pool.idle.time
property.description: Maximum idle time in sec before a connection is closed, for estimate queries. If this property is not specified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.pool.idle.time would be used. Override this property to tune estimate connection pool.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.pool.max.statements
property.description: Maximum number of prepared statements to cache per connection, for estimate queries. If this property is not specified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.pool.max.statements would be used.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.estimate.get.connection.timeout
property.description: Response timeout in milliseconds of any JDBC call invoking data transmission over a connection socket , for estimate queries. If this property is not specified, value for lens.driver.jdbc.get.connection.timeout would be used. Override this property to tune estimate connection pool.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.explain.keyword
property.description: Explain keyword used to get the query plan of underlying database

property.name: lens.cube.query.driver.supported.storages
property.description: List of comma separated storage names that supported by a driver. If no value is specified, all storages are valid

property.name: lens.cube.query.replace.timedim
property.description: Tells whether timedim attribute queried in the time range should be replaced with its corresponding partition column name.

property.name: lens.cube.query.time.range.writer.class
property.description: The timerange writer class which specifies how the resolved partitions in timeranges should be written in final query. Available writers are org.apache.lens.cube.parse.ORTimeRangeWriter and org.apache.lens.cube.parse.BetweenTimeRangeWriter

property.name: lens.cube.query.partition.where.clause.format
property.description: The simple date format of how the queried partition should be put in where clause. If nothing is specified, it will use the format from org.apache.lens.cube.metadata.UpdatePeriod for each type of partition

property.name: lens.query.timeout.millis
property.description: The runtime(millis) of the query after which query will be timedout and cancelled. Default is 1 hour for jdbc queries.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.enable.resultset.streaming.retrieval
property.description: Flag to enable row by row retrieval of result set from the database server. This is used to enable streaming result sets for MySQL. This is set to false by default.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.fetch.size
property.description: Fetch size for JDBC result set

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.validate.through.prepare
property.description: Flag to enable query syntactic and semantic validation using prepared statement.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.query.launching.constraint.factories
property.description: Factories used to instantiate constraints enforced on queries by driver. A query will be launched only if all constraints pass. Every Factory should be an implementation of org.apache.lens.server.api.common.ConfigBasedObjectCreationFactory and create an implementation of org.apache.lens.server.api.query.constraint.QueryLaunchingConstraint.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.waiting.queries.selection.policy.factories
property.description: Factories used to instantiate driver specific waiting queries selection policies. Every factory should be an implementation of org.apache.lens.server.api.common.ConfigBasedObjectCreationFactory and create an implementation of org.apache.lens.server.api.query.collect.WaitingQueriesSelectionPolicy.

property.name: driver.max.concurrent.launched.queries
property.description: Maximum queries which can be launched simultaneously on this driver. This should be equal to lens.driver.jdbc.pool.max.size. This configuration value is only useful when MaxConcurrentDriverQueriesConstraint is enabled by using org.apache.lens.server.api.query.constraint.MaxConcurrentDriverQueriesConstraintFactory as one of the factories in lens.driver.jdbc.query.constraint.factories property.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.statement.cancel.supported
property.description: Flag to indicate Whether cancel on JDBC statement is supported. If not supported, framework wont call cancel on JDBC statement.

property.name: lens.driver.jdbc.cost.calculator.class
property.description: Cost calculator class. By default calculating cost through static values

property.name: lens.driver.query.cost
property.description: Jdbc driver static cost value

property.name: lens.driver.cost.query.decider.class
property.description: Decider class which looks at ranges passed in config and decides the querycosttype

property.name: lens.driver.cost.type.ranges
property.description: Cost based Query type mapping

property.name: retry.messages.contains.map
property.description: Comma separated error messages and retry policy

property.name: query.retry.policy.classes
property.description: List of classes to decide policies

property.name: lens.cube.query.user.groups.authorization.enable
property.description: true if authorization is based on User Groups, false otherwise

property.name: lens.cube.query.user.name.authorization.enable
property.description: true if authorization is based on User Name, false otherwise
